metadata.title: CVE-2020-20891 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in function config_input in libavfilter/vf_gblur.c in Ffmpeg 4.2.1, allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service or other unspecified impacts.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3').
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
vice package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
